description.lang: ZHC5010 is a wall switch module with four buttons, four LEDs, a built-in relay switch and is designed to fit into standard Danish LK FUGA wall boxes.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline
Send Basic Report (On/Off) when button #1 is used.
Sends Basic Set (On/Off) when button #1 is used.
Sends Binary Switch Set (On/Off) when button #1 is used.
Send Binary Toggle Switch Set when button #1 is used.
Sends Multilevel Switch Set / Multilevel Switch Start Level Change / Multilevel Switch Stop Level Change when button #1 is used.
Send Basic Report (On/Off) when button #2 is used.
Sends Basic Set (On/Off) when button #2 is used.
Sends Binary Switch Set (On/Off) when button #2 is used.
Send Binary Toggle Switch Set when button #2 is used.
Sends Multilevel Switch Set / Multilevel Switch Start Level Change / Multilevel Switch Stop Level Change when button #2 is used.
Send Basic Report (On/Off) when button #3 is used.
Sends Basic Set (On/Off) when button #3 is used.
Sends Binary Switch Set (On/Off) when button #3 is used.
Send Binary Toggle Switch Set when button #3 is used.
Sends Multilevel Switch Set / Multilevel Switch Start Level Change / Multilevel Switch Stop Level Change when button #3 is used.
Send Basic Report (On/Off) when button #4 is used.
Sends Basic Set (On/Off) when button #4 is used.
Sends Binary Switch Set (On/Off) when button #4 is used.
Send Binary Toggle Switch Set when button #4 is used.
Sends Multilevel Switch Set / Multilevel Switch Start Level Change / Multilevel Switch Stop Level Change when button #4 is used.
Configuration of Pair Mode for the upper two buttons (button #1 and #2).
Separate mode (toggle mode).
In pair mode, left side sends on/up commands, right side sends off/down commands.
Configure the percentage of light in the LED, when the LED is turned on.
Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is on.
Configure the percentage of light in the LED, when the LED is turned off.
Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is off.
Configure the percentage of light in the LED, when the LED is turned off.
Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is off.
Configure the percentage of light in the LED, when the LED is turned off.
Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is off.
Configure the percentage of light in the LED, when the LED is turned off.
Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is off.
This parameter configures which of the buttons that shall control the built-in relay, or if the relay only will be activated for one second, each time button #1 is used.
Relay is disabled.
Relay is controlled by button #1 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active.
Relay is controlled by button #2 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active.
Relay is controlled by button #3 or by lower paddle when pair mode is active.
Relay is controlled by button #4 or by lower paddle when pair mode is active.
Relay is activated for one second and is controlled by button #1 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active.

When ZHC5010 receives an Indicator Set message, then the received value can be used only to set the current light level for the actual LED or the level value can be stored and will then be used for subsequent internal LED activations.
Indicator Set level values are only used to control the LED.
Indicator Set level values are also used by internal LED activations.
Configure the scene sequence numbers that will be transmitted by Central Scene notifications.
Scene notifications are turned off.
Button #1 will send scene [value], button #2 will send scene [value] + 1, button #3 will send scene [value] + 2, button #4 will send scene [value] + 3.
This parameter is able to enable or disable the so-called House Cleaning Mode, where ZHC5010 is able to send a dimming command in order to set the level of the lights to 100%.
House Cleaning Mode is enabled.
House Cleaning Mode is disabled; double-press button scene notifications will be disabled too.
Configuration of Pair Mode for the lower two buttons (button #3 and #4).
Separate mode (toggle mode).
In pair mode, left side sends on/up commands, right side sends off/down commands.

name.lang: Control of association groups for device 1 (button #1)

description.lang: Enable or disable if received commands are relayed to the nodes in the association groups.
When commands are received by device 1, nodes in the association groups will not be switched, button activations will still send switch values.
When commands are received by device 1, nodes in the association groups will be switched.

name.lang: Control of association groups for device 2 (button #2)

description.lang: Enable or disable if received commands are relayed to the nodes in the association groups.
When commands are received by device 2, nodes in the association groups will not be switched, button activations will still send switch values.
When commands are received by device 2, nodes in the association groups will be switched.

name.lang: Control of association groups for device 3 (button #3)

description.lang: Enable or disable if received commands are relayed to the nodes in the association groups.
When commands are received by device 3, nodes in the association groups will not be switched, button activations will still send switch values.
When commands are received by device 3, nodes in the association groups will be switched.

name.lang: Control of association groups for device 4 (button #4)

description.lang: Enable or disable if received commands are relayed to the nodes in the association groups.
When commands are received by device 4, nodes in the association groups will not be switched, button activations will still send switch values.
When commands are received by device 4, nodes in the association groups will be switched.
Configuration of the LED status indication.
LED indication is disabled (LED can be controlled by Indicator Command Class Set commands).
LED indicates the status of the corresponding button.
LED indicates the status of the corresponding button, with inverted indication.
LED indicates the status of corresponding paddle (in pair mode).
LED indicates the status of the corresponding paddle (in pair mode), with inverted indication.
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay.
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay, with inverted indication.
LED show a 5 seconds indication when the corresponding button is pressed.
Configuration of the LED status indication.
LED indication is disabled (LED can be controlled by Indicator Command Class Set commands).
LED indicates the status of the corresponding button.
LED indicates the status of the corresponding button, with inverted indication.
LED indicates the status of corresponding paddle (in pair mode).
LED indicates the status of the corresponding paddle (in pair mode), with inverted indication.
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay.
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay, with inverted indication.
LED show a 5 seconds indication when the corresponding button is pressed.

LED indicates the status of the corresponding paddle (in pair mode), with inverted indication.
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay.
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay, with inverted indication.
LED show a 5 seconds indication when the corresponding button is pressed.

LED indication is disabled (LED can be controlled by Indicator Command Class Set commands).

LED indicates the status of corresponding paddle (in pair mode).

LED indicates the status of the built-in relay.

Configure the percentage of light in the LED, when the LED is turned on.
Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is on.

Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is on.
Configure the percentage of light in the LED, when the LED is turned on.
